amendment.description: Amendment makes a technical clarification to section 2 of the bill and provides that no additional funds are authorized or otherwise made available to carry out the requirements of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in House Report 114-503, to clarify that the Act shall be carried out using using only funds that are appropriated.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Meehan.
